mapper.insert: insert into wxpay (out_trade_no, body, total_fee, redirect_url, notify_url, spbill_create_ip) values (#{outTradeNo}, #{body}, #{totalFee}, #{redirectUrl}, #{notifyUrl}, #{spbillCreateIp})
mapper.update: update wxpay set appid = #{appid}, mch_id = #{mchId}, result_code = #{resultCode}, transaction_id=#{transactionId}, openid = #{openid}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, settlement_total_fee=#{settlementTotalFee}, time_end = #{timeEnd} where out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}
